Package camzup.core

Class ParserGgr

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.ParserGgr
public abstract class ParserGgr
extends java.lang.Object
A GIMP (GNU Image Manipulation Program) gradient file (.ggr) parser class.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static Gradient load​(java.io.BufferedReader in, int samples)
      Parses a .ggr file containing a GIMP gradient. Given the differences between the two implementations, this may not always return a matching result, for example, when the source file contains only one key.

      This code is adapted to Java from the public domain Python of Ned Batchelder. See nedbatchelder.com/ .
      Parameters:
      in - the buffered reader
      samples - the number of samples
      Returns:
      the gradient

    • load

      public static Gradient load​(java.lang.String fileName, int samples)
      Parses a .ggr file containing a GIMP gradient.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file name
      samples - the number of samples
      Returns:
      the gradient
